programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Chef Jean-Paul Bourgeois and the crew are back at it for season 3 of duck camp dinners. With a historically dry year in Louisiana, the team dodges marsh fires, hunts alligators, and prepares for the opening day of teal season.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a “Tensas Limit” of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: With the drought ending and rain headed their way, the crew hunts the final days of the first split in Bayou Black with new friends Jesse Griffiths and Dirk Sorrells.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Danny heads back to his hometown for the first time in his adult life hoping to make some quick connections with his salty roots.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of fishing in the enchanting waters of the Everglades alongside the renowned Captain Danny Allen and Captain Leiza Fitzgerald. Embark on an unforgettable journey through the intricate maze of mangroves, expansive marshes, and shimmering backwaters, as these expert guides lead you to some of the most coveted fishing spots in the region.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Join Captain Danny Allen and Dan Benson from Power-Pole as they embark on an exciting fishing expedition in Cortez, Florida, in the latest installment of Beyond The Surface TV. Witness their relentless pursuit of fish as they adapt to the ever-changing conditions. Don't make the mistake of skipping this captivating episode – it's bound to leave you hooked!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Captain Danny Allen and Captain Bill Pitman are two seasoned fishermen who share an unyielding passion for the art of angling. Their extraordinary skills and deep love for the sea have led them to the breathtaking waters of Fernandina Beach , a hidden gem known for its abundant marine life and picturesque surroundings.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Dive into the exhilarating world of tarpon fishing in the historic city of St. Augustine, Florida. Join Capt. Danny as henavigates the timeless waters of the oldest city in Florida, seeking the mighty tarpon. These fish will test your angling skills and endurance.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: With the Spring of 23’ Turkey Seasons still in full swing and tags still left to fill… I wanted to rerelease the “best of turkey season past”. The beginning clips shows the 2020 Single Season Archery Grand Slam in 38 Days! The second clips are my attempt to repeat in 2021!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Low turkey numbers and a few trespassers made this season tougher than normal. John hits a couple states in pursuit of a few gobblers, but ends up not punching his last tag for a reason that is not to common and often not discussed in conservation circles.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Never in a million years did I think I would be in Spain, much less hunting… An opportunity to chase true 100% Balerian Goats on the island of Mallorca presented itself after the 2023 season was already planned and set in motion. What do you? You make every effort to make it happen! Logistics, flight delays, and language barriers turned a 4 day hunt into 2. Witnessing their conservation efforts was definitely the highlight of the trip. Although different, it very much works for them and something others could learn from as we hunt to protect these species. Saddle up for a wild 2 days!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: When Under Armour became the Title Sponsor of the Tactical Games, well…. I actually learned what the Tactical Games were. Kinda cross fit, kinda strong man all mixed with AR and pistol shooting. Ok, Sign me up!! But what did I just sign up for?! I was about to find out!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John returns to Colorado and looks to connect with another archery velvet mule deer. With a great week of weather ahead, there should be plenty of stalk opportunities!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: An unusually warm Iowa November led John to hunting clover food plots and a bit of deja vu. A buck John passed several times in 2022 would resurface on the same plot, and walk the same path as he did exactly 1 year prior to the day, only 30 mins off. Do you believe deer will repeat themselves? This episode might make you think so!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Usually my summers are filled with trail cameras, food plots, and prepping for the whitetail season. This year I actually got ahead of the game and was able to carve out a week to go try some new hunting…. Bowfishing! I love to shoot bows and I love to fish, why not do them both at the same time?! It took awhile to get dialed in, but once I learned the refraction of the water & lights, thing heat up fast!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: On this episode Capt. Danny joins his good buddy and talented marine artist, Stephen Ferrell. The two of them take the 27’ DekKat to fish some of Stephen’s favorite paddle-board spots here in Melbourne, Florida. Tune in and see what they can make happen on a challenging weather day seeking the elusive Snook!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin Leake takes redfish tournament pro Fred Meyers out of his comfort zone to talk trash and chase tarpon just a few hundred yards off a lively Panama City Beach.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman has made her name over the last two decades as one of the most dedicated hunters and producers in the outdoor industry. In this episode we’ll tag along with Melissa while she chases big game around the world with her Winchester in hand. First, we’ll head to Prince of Whales Island as Melissa tries to catch up to a giant black bear, then travel across the pond to chase mountain ibex, New Zealand for tar, and back to the states for whitetail.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode Slade takes Bentley on his very first duck hunt. Slade also gets to take a trip to duck hunting paradise with some great buddies of his. This episode is all about having a great time with great friends.

programme.title: HUnting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and his brother Tai take us around a new investment property - a 55 acre tract in Wilkinson County, MS and go over what it took to take an undesirable raw tract, to a place with multiple offers on the first day it was put on the market.
Adam and Logan Hays chase big bucks in the Buckeye State!

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: The boys have a full camp for their first bow hunt of the season. With warm Temps and acorns falling everywhere, Nate throws a hail Mary on the last day on a buck they call "The Squiggly 8"

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: It happens, especially once the rut rolls around. A Monster Buck named drops that Tyler Jordan had been hunting all season wonders over to the neighbors and is shot by hunter Wesley Tyus. Check out the story of Drops and how Tyler was able to be there for the recovery of this once in a lifetime buck.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach heads back to the homeland to chase ducks and geese in the prairie potholes.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors

programme.title: HuntStand Presents

programme.title: HuntStand TIps and Gear
programme.desc: Join Cody Butler for a deep dive into ground blind strategies for bowhunting turkeys. Discover essential tips and tactics for bagging big toms with your bow from ground blinds. Learn about optimal blind placement for a successful turkey hunt.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: Kyle Barefield of All Things Hunting and Willi Schmidt of Pure Hunting share their personal stories of how hunting has been an integral part of their lives, passed down through generations. While their beginnings and experiences are very different, they find common ground in the heritage of Browning Firearms with memorable whitetail hunts in Louisiana and Montana.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: Cliff draws the tag of a lifetime in Iowa, but the hunt doesn’t go as expected. Without his sick friend Stephen, and facing challenges with self-filming, Cliff contemplates giving up. But when he finally takes the biggest buck of his life, he realizes the importance of capturing the moment. Learn from his journey and see why every hunt matters!

programme.title: Modern Hunter

programme.desc: Josh and Alex Fogg The Coastal Resource Manager of Destin / Ft. Walton beach fish some of the artificial reefs that have been deployed over the past 20 years.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see what’s biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and George from Two Georges Marina battle the wind and tide on a tough day of fishing which leads Josh to fish another day, solely for revenge on the Sheepshead!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Join Captain Josh and Sheriff Eric Aden for a day of fishing and fun in Destin, Florida. These two friends hit the water, catching fish both offshore and inshore, and reeling in some impressive catches. With plenty of laughs, great stories, and a few surprises along the way, this episode is all about the joy of fishing and the bond between two guys who love the sea.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Cajun classics are met with a Zimbabwean flair in this delicious mashup of cultures. programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Louisiana’s Cajun Ninja joins Chef Jay Ducote in our latest catch-and-cook adventure. Tag along as they hit up the hottest fishing spots in Plaquemines Parish with Captain Shane York and turn their catches into authentic Cajun meals.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew leaves the bayous and heads down river to Venice, Louisiana where they prepare for their first duck hunt in the delta.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The DCD crew spends a day on the water fishing in an effort to complete the trifecta of a meat haul. Blake shows us where he spent much of his childhood and we get a glimpse of mother natures impact on community.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Antlers on ConQuest deer farm must be removed to ensure the safety of bucks fighting and killing each other. Watch how Doug Roberts selects only the best typical bucks for his breeding program.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug Roberts takes his knee surgeon hunting at High Rack Ranch of Michigan, from pheasant hunting to big whitetails. Doug Roberts decides to take the advice of his doctor and schedule surgery for his second knee replacement.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Collecting semen from breeder bucks only happens when Doug has found the perfect typical whitetail. A 7x7 named Bruce, son of Die Hard is being collected.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Join Doug Roberts as he selects his newest breeder bucks on the deer farm. Cutting antlers and visiting the annual youth buck pole marks the start of hunting season. Special guest Cody Robins from Live 2 Hunt.

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Daily farm activities during the busy season. Main topic VS 1, pullingcedars. Cody Robison's Whitetail Hunt using 10 point and using VS 1

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: ConQuest Scents travels to the ATA show and releases their new Heat Seeker product to the public. After ATA they head home to the farm and start building a new addition to the main facility.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton and Trevor pack up and drive down to Arkansas for their first experience on the White River. The brothers spend a day in the boat with Bryant Stark of Rising Rivers, fishing the White and the Norfork. Though the White is much larger waters than back home, Trevor utilizes his experience to catch them even while wading.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: In Episode 10 Boat Trader heads to central Texas to explore boating culture in the lone star state. Second only to Alaska in size, Texas is known as the place where everything is bigger. From big college football games to endless oil fields and vast wind farms, Texas is home to more than 30 million Americans. But the state is about more than just big oil, college football and cattle farms - it's also home to some of the best boating in the country. Boasting a myriad of waterways, boaters here enjoy hundreds of lakes, rivers and streams that provide recreational opportunities, abundant wildlife and plenty of fishing. From Austin Texas to San Antonio host Ryan McVinney and the Boat Trader crew explore the laid-back Texas lake life including boat up restaurants along the Colorado River, watersports in Austin and the history of the waterways throughout the region. Boat manufacturers highlighted in this episode are Tige Boats and ATX Surf Boats, two premium Texas-based wake boat brands known for their high-quality, cutting-edge vessels that come equipped with advanced wake shaping technologies and equipment ideal for water skiing, wake surfing and wakeboarding. There's even a wake surfing dog!

programme.desc: Chef Jean-Paul Bourgeois and the crew are back at it for season 3 of duck camp dinners. With a historically dry year in Louisiana, the team dodges marsh fires, hunts alligators, and prepares for the opening day of teal season.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Follow the DCD crew as they head North to hunt with duck call maker Brad Eldrige. Despite tough hunting conditions brought on by a historic drought in Louisiana, the crew is able to knock down a “Tensas Limit” of wood ducks, mallards, honkers, and squirrels.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: With the drought ending and rain headed their way, the crew hunts the final days of the first split in Bayou Black with new friends Jesse Griffiths and Dirk Sorrells.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Danny heads back to his hometown for the first time in his adult life hoping to make some quick connections with his salty roots.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of fishing in the enchanting waters of the Everglades alongside the renowned Captain Danny Allen and Captain Leiza Fitzgerald. Embark on an unforgettable journey through the intricate maze of mangroves, expansive marshes, and shimmering backwaters, as these expert guides lead you to some of the most coveted fishing spots in the region.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Join Captain Danny Allen and Dan Benson from Power-Pole as they embark on an exciting fishing expedition in Cortez, Florida, in the latest installment of Beyond The Surface TV. Witness their relentless pursuit of fish as they adapt to the ever-changing conditions. Don't make the mistake of skipping this captivating episode – it's bound to leave you hooked!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Captain Danny Allen and Captain Bill Pitman are two seasoned fishermen who share an unyielding passion for the art of angling. Their extraordinary skills and deep love for the sea have led them to the breathtaking waters of Fernandina Beach , a hidden gem known for its abundant marine life and picturesque surroundings.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Dive into the exhilarating world of tarpon fishing in the historic city of St. Augustine, Florida. Join Capt. Danny as henavigates the timeless waters of the oldest city in Florida, seeking the mighty tarpon. These fish will test your angling skills and endurance.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: With the Spring of 23’ Turkey Seasons still in full swing and tags still left to fill… I wanted to rerelease the “best of turkey season past”. The beginning clips shows the 2020 Single Season Archery Grand Slam in 38 Days! The second clips are my attempt to repeat in 2021!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Low turkey numbers and a few trespassers made this season tougher than normal. John hits a couple states in pursuit of a few gobblers, but ends up not punching his last tag for a reason that is not to common and often not discussed in conservation circles.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Never in a million years did I think I would be in Spain, much less hunting… An opportunity to chase true 100% Balerian Goats on the island of Mallorca presented itself after the 2023 season was already planned and set in motion. What do you? You make every effort to make it happen! Logistics, flight delays, and language barriers turned a 4 day hunt into 2. Witnessing their conservation efforts was definitely the highlight of the trip. Although different, it very much works for them and something others could learn from as we hunt to protect these species. Saddle up for a wild 2 days!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: When Under Armour became the Title Sponsor of the Tactical Games, well…. I actually learned what the Tactical Games were. Kinda cross fit, kinda strong man all mixed with AR and pistol shooting. Ok, Sign me up!! But what did I just sign up for?! I was about to find out!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John returns to Colorado and looks to connect with another archery velvet mule deer. With a great week of weather ahead, there should be plenty of stalk opportunities!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: An unusually warm Iowa November led John to hunting clover food plots and a bit of deja vu. A buck John passed several times in 2022 would resurface on the same plot, and walk the same path as he did exactly 1 year prior to the day, only 30 mins off. Do you believe deer will repeat themselves? This episode might make you think so!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: Usually my summers are filled with trail cameras, food plots, and prepping for the whitetail season. This year I actually got ahead of the game and was able to carve out a week to go try some new hunting…. Bowfishing! I love to shoot bows and I love to fish, why not do them both at the same time?! It took awhile to get dialed in, but once I learned the refraction of the water & lights, thing heat up fast!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: On this episode Capt. Danny joins his good buddy and talented marine artist, Stephen Ferrell. The two of them take the 27’ DekKat to fish some of Stephen’s favorite paddle-board spots here in Melbourne, Florida. Tune in and see what they can make happen on a challenging weather day seeking the elusive Snook!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun

programme.title: Winchester Life

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: In Episode 10 Boat Trader heads to central Texas to explore boating culture in the lone star state. Second only to Alaska in size, Texas is known as the place where everything is bigger. From big college football games to endless oil fields and vast wind farms, Texas is home to more than 30 million Americans. But the state is about more than just big oil, college football and cattle farms - it's also home to some of the best boating in the country. Boasting a myriad of waterways, boaters here enjoy hundreds of lakes, rivers and streams that provide recreational opportunities, abundant wildlife and plenty of fishing. From Austin Texas to San Antonio host Ryan McVinney and the Boat Trader crew explore the laid-back Texas lake life including boat up restaurants along the Colorado River, watersports in Austin and the history of the waterways throughout the region. Boat manufacturers highlighted in this episode are Tige Boats and ATX Surf Boats, two premium Texas-based wake boat brands known for their high-quality, cutting-edge vessels that come equipped with advanced wake shaping technologies and equipment ideal for water skiing, wake surfing and wakeboarding. There's even a wake surfing dog!

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: A-list romantic comedy about the lives of three people with different backgrounds who closely bond in their struggle to conquer sex addiction.

programme.title: Barefoot
programme.desc: The disgraced son of a wealthy family takes a job as a janitor at a psychiatric hospital, where he falls in love with a young female patient.

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A struggling college graduate gets way more than she bargained for when she gets hired as a nanny for a neurotic and rich New York City client.

programme.title: The Sapphires
programme.desc: Four women become unlikely stars by singing for the troops in Vietnam with the help of an R&B-loving musician.

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: The imaginative musical tale of an aspiring actress and jazz musician falling in love as they struggle to make their dreams come true.

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A disgraced record exec forms a bond with a young singer-songwriter changing each of their lives.

programme.title: A Hologram for the King
programme.desc: Desperate for new business, an American businessman packs up his product and travels to Saudi Arabia in a last ditch effort to generate revenue.

programme.title: The Hudsucker Proxy
programme.desc: When the founder of a large corporation suddenly dies, the board conspires to tank the stock price by installing a lowly mailroom clerk as president.

programme.title: Jackie Chan's First Strike
programme.desc: Caught between the CIA, the Mafia, and Russian intelligence, a keen yet bumbling cop finds himself at the center of a plot to steal a nuclear warhead.

programme.title: The Majestic
programme.desc: Upon getting into a car accident, a Hollywood screenwriter develops amnesia and ends up in a small town, where he is mistaken for a missing war hero.

programme.title: State & Main
programme.desc: The residents of a small Vermont town don't know what hit them when a beleaguered Hollywood film crew brings a chaotic shoot to their quaint village.

programme.title: The 11th Hour
programme.desc: Leading scientists, thinkers, and politicians discuss what can be done in the face of climate change and the collapse of life-sustaining ecosystems.

programme.title: The Accidental Tourist
programme.desc: The touching story of a travel writer who hates to travel and loves order - until suddenly everything changes.

programme.title: The Fish That Saved Pittsburgh
programme.desc: Basketball superstars Dr. J and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar star in a comedy combining sports, the new age, and disco.

programme.title: Ladyhawke
programme.desc: A medieval pickpocket who escapes the noose becomes indebted to a shapeshifting knight and his star-crossed lover on a revenge quest to kill a bishop.

programme.title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
programme.desc: Four of Hollywood’s greatest directors tell stories, exploring the region just beyond the boundary of reality.

programme.title: The Year of Living Dangerously
programme.desc: A reporter suddenly rockets to importance after he gains access to inside information about a coup.

programme.title: The Mission
programme.desc: Two men of God defy great military powers to protect those who seek sanctuary in The Mission.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Academy Award-winners Warren Beatty and Annette Bening star in a romantic tale of lovers torn apart by fate.

programme.title: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: The haunting true story of a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter and his translator, trapped amidst the brutal horrors of Cambodia's Khmer Rouge regime.

programme.title: The Hitman
programme.desc: A cop (Chuck Norris) exacts revenge on those who wronged him by going undercover as a hit man.

programme.title: The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
programme.desc: This comedy prequel contains wild car chases and crashes, Daisy's hilarious hijinks, and a bevy of laughs.

programme.title: Three To Tango
programme.desc: An architect pretends to be gay to win a job opportunity, but the ploy may cause him to lose his ideal woman.

programme.title: Monkey Trouble
programme.desc: Eva's (Thora Birch) mom (Mimi Rodgers) is obsessively neat; her dad's (Christopher McDonald) allergic to fur. But when a thieving organ grinder's (Harvey Keitel) monkey escapes, Eva bonds with a new friend. As much as she tries, Eva can't housebreak her new pet ... or break him of his training to steal. And Eva's getting the blame in this heartwarming family comedy.

programme.title: Surf Ninjas
programme.desc: Two surfer dudes discover they are princes of a small South Pacific island and are destined to save their native land from a cruel despot.

programme.title: Suburban Commando
programme.desc: Forced to take a vacation in a quiet American suburb, an intergalactic warrior must protect his new human friends when bounty hunters track him down.

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn and Burt Reynolds star as two screenwriters who face chaos after meeting each other's families.

programme.title: Disorderlies
programme.desc: Three friends must save a wealthy, ailing curmudgeon from the morbid plans of the man's greedy nephew.

programme.title: Hot to Trot
programme.desc: A hapless stockbroker meets a talking horse, and everything changes.

programme.title: Osmosis Jones
programme.desc: Inside the body of a zoo worker, a white-blood-cell cop and a cold tablet join forces to stop a virulent virus that’s intent on taking over The City.

programme.title: Strange Brew
programme.desc: When a deranged Brewmeister plans to turn beer into a mind-control device, two friends must save the world.

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: When he arrives in the big city, lovable robot Johnny 5 encounters nefarious thugs who see his innocence as their high-tech ticket to easy street.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenage girl struggles to balance the trials of high school, the discipline of martial arts, and the thrill of her first romance.

programme.title: Lost in Yonkers
programme.desc: A film adaptation of Neil Simon's Pulitzer Prize-winning comedy/drama that follows the escapades and tragedies of an unusual family in 1942 Yonkers.

programme.title: Vice Versa
programme.desc: An ill-gotten mystical skull has a body-and-mind-switching effect on a high-powered department store exec and his neglected 11-year-old son.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A workaholic heart surgeon accidentally ingests a brain-transference serum, causing him to switch bodies with his laid-back teenage son.

programme.title: Relative Chaos
programme.desc: Dil and his girlfriend, Katherine, attempt to end his 25-year losing streak in the annual Gilbert Cup, a fiercely competitive family tradition.

programme.title: Bingo
programme.desc: A circus dog named Bingo becomes involved in a variety of adventures and misdemeanors, but that doesn't stop him from eventually making his way home!

programme.title: Slappy and the Stinkers
programme.desc: On a class trip to the aquarium, school kids rebel against their mean principal by stealing a sea lion that seems unhappy and trying to set it free.

programme.title: Miracle on the Mountain: The Kincaid Family Story
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film recounts a family's struggle for survival after their private plane crashes on their way to a cabin in the mountains.

programme.title: Bermuda Triangle
programme.desc: A sudden storm leaves a family shipwrecked on an uncharted island inhabited by other stranded settlers and a tribe of natives with strange powers.

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: A tech geek expelled from school for pulling pranks on staff becomes the one person with enough savvy to rescue students from a gang of kidnappers.

programme.title: Fast Getaway
programme.desc: A falling out within a bank robbing foursome splits up the group and pits a father and his 16-year-old son against their vengeful former partners.

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: When a lovable mechanical marvel of a robot is accidentally electrocuted, he flees his lab and lands on a young girl’s doorstep, ready for adventure

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: When he arrives in the big city, lovable robot Johnny 5 encounters nefarious thugs who see his innocence as their high-tech ticket to easy street.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A workaholic heart surgeon accidentally ingests a brain-transference serum, causing him to switch bodies with his laid-back teenage son.

programme.title: Baby Geniuses
programme.desc: When a scheming billionaire decides to steal the pre-language baby code to take over the world, the little tykes team up and fight back.

programme.title: The Trumpet of the Swan
programme.desc: A mute little trumpeter swan worries about finding his way in the world, until a gift helps him find his voice and embark on a high-flying adventure.

programme.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: A princess and her prince work together in order to save the kingdom and keep a magical artifact out of the hands of an evil villain.

programme.title: Madeline
programme.desc: Ludwig Bemelmans’ beloved story comes to life as the famously precocious and bright Parisian youngster must save her school from being sold.

programme.title: Vice Versa
programme.desc: An ill-gotten mystical skull has a body-and-mind-switching effect on a high-powered department store exec and his neglected 11-year-old son.

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Warm holiday tale about a single mom wishing for a loving man for Christmas. Soon, her daughter tells a mall Santa who tries to grant her Mom’s wish.

programme.title: Ice Castles
programme.desc: This remake of the 1979 film finds Alexis on the cusp of figure skating stardom when an accident on the ice takes her sight, but not her courage.

programme.title: Zoom
programme.desc: A former superhero who has lost his powers is forced back into action to help turn a motley crew of kids into the next great world-savers.

programme.title: Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: When a riding accident causes a teenage equestrian to lose her eyesight, a miniature horse named Apple is trained to be her seeing eye companion.

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: In the spirit of bonding with his dysfunctional family, patriarch Bob rents a motorhome for what becomes a madcap road trip to the Colorado Rockies.

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Bob Davis (Fred Astaire), an American dancer in Buenos Aires, Argentina, finds himself desperate for work after losing all his money. He takes a gig at a wedding, hoping to impress the bride's father, Eduardo Acuña (Adolphe Menjou), a local club owner who has decreed that his daughters must marry in order of age. Eduardo eventually agrees to allow Bob to perform at his club, but only under the condition that he play suitor to his second-oldest daughter, the beautiful Maria (Rita Hayworth).

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: The Solid Gold Cadillac
programme.desc: A small stockholder-turned-corporate heroine ousts a crooked Board of Trustees and reinstates an honest director, falling in love along the way.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: The prince's quest for revenge becomes his undoing when his suspicion is confirmed that his uncle killed his father to win the throne and his mother.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A stranded group of six Allied soldiers trek across the desert, making their way to an abandoned fort, but are soon faced with a German battalion.

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: In this stylish spy thriller, a Londoner working in British Intelligence, Alexander Eberlin, turns out to be a Russian counter-espionage agent.

programme.title: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: In this suspenseful comedy, Nancy Troy (Loretta Young) and her mystery-author husband, Jeff (Brian Aherne), move into a dark basement apartment in New York City's Greenwich Village, in hopes of stirring up writing inspiration. When their neighbors begin acting oddly and one of them turns up dead, Nancy and Jeff must uncover a murder mystery in their own building, with a number of suspects lurking about, including the creepy Mrs. Devoe (Gale Sondergaard).

programme.title: Shopworn
programme.desc: After her release from a three-month prison sentence, Kitty Lane becomes an overnight musical sensation and renews her romance with David Livingston.

programme.title: Pal Joey
programme.desc: Charming musical featuring the love triangle between a lovable but mischievous man and the two women who could change his life, for love or money.

programme.title: The Whole Town's Talking
programme.desc: Clerk Arthur Jones (Edward G. Robinson) lives a dull life until someone realizes that he looks like gangster "Killer" Mannion (also Robinson). After Jones is brought in by the police and his identity is verified, he is given a note to assuage any other suspicious policeman. Jones is hired by a newspaper to write about Mannion and starts dating Wilhelmina Clark (Jean Arthur). However, when Jones returns home one night, Mannion is waiting and demands the note so that he can roam freely.

programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: A rich merchant's beautiful daughter and her volatile older sister are courted by rival suitors in this rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy.

programme.title: Hot Blood
programme.desc: A gypsy woman who lives by decamping with marriage settlements from wealthy men meets her match in the handsome younger brother of a gypsy king.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: A malfunction inadvertently sends American planes armed with nuclear warheads to Russia in a blunder of potentially apocalyptic proportions.

programme.title: Three on a Couch
programme.desc: An artist hopes to move to Paris, but his psychiatrist fiancée fears abandoning her patients, so he dons various disguises to cure the lonesome women.

programme.title: No Sad Songs for Me
programme.desc: Upon being diagnosed with terminal cancer, selfless suburban housewife Mary Scott (Margaret Sullavan) makes the ultimate sacrifice: she decides to keep the unpleasant news from her husband, Brad (Wendell Corey), and daughter, Polly, to avoid devastating her loved ones. Instead, Mary encourages Brad's affair with a co-worker (Viveca Lindfors), and even grooms the other woman to take her place. But as Mary's illness progresses, keeping it a secret presents a considerable challenge.

programme.title: In the French Style
programme.desc: A young American travels to Paris to become an artist. Swept up in a series of affairs, she must decide whether to stay or return home to get married.

programme.title: The Trouble with Angels
programme.desc: A Reverend Mother faces an uphill battle to reform a pair of young, hard-to-reach troublemakers who’ve been wreaking havoc on her convent school.

programme.title: Rockin' in the Rockies
programme.desc: Shorty Williams (Moe Howard) is put in charge of his cousin's ranch, but he is more concerned with becoming a prospector. He comes across two drifters (Larry Fine, Curly Howard) who just got lucky at the roulette table and befriends them as possible investors. Shorty also meets singer Betty (Gladys Blake) and her partner (Mary Beth Hughes) and convinces them to stay on the ranch along with the vagrants. Unfortunately, Shorty's cousin, Rusty (Jay Kirby), returns early and isn't pleased.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Jim Leonard, a penniless aviator and airplane mechanic, falls in love with the wealthy Carol Owen while giving her flying lessons.

programme.title: Gidget Grows Up
programme.desc: When her boyfriend leaves for the Air Force without calling, Gidget heads to New York in the name of world peace and joins the U.N. as a tour guide.

programme.title: You Belong to Me
programme.desc: Rich playboy Peter Kirk (Henry Fonda) crashes into Dr. Helen Hunt (Barbara Stanwyck) on a ski slope and overplays his injuries so she will continue her medical attention. He declares his love, and, although Helen insists that her career will always come first, the two get married. Soon, Peter is consumed by jealous suspicions of his wife's male patients and embarrasses Helen several times. Fearful of driving her away, Peter launches into character-changing behavior to prove his love.

programme.title: The Cockleshell Heroes
programme.desc: During World War II, feuding leaders train British recruits for a risky covert mission to blow up a giant battleship in an enemy-held French port.

programme.title: Miss Grant Takes Richmond
programme.desc: A bookie operating behind a real estate front gets pulled into the business for real when he hires a daffy secretary who thinks the office is legit.

programme.title: Hook, Line and Sinker
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a terminal illness, Peter decides to go out with a bang— racking up $100,000 in credit card debt—only to find he's not dying after all.

programme.title: A Raisin in the Sun
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier stars in this iconic version of the famous play about a cash poor family who start to fray when they inherit a life insurance payout.

programme.title: The Untamed Breed
programme.desc: Texas ranchers resist an out-of-towner (Sonny Tufts) who has a Brahman bull to breed.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: Jack McCall, Desperado
programme.desc: A lone gunslinger, Jack McCall (George Montgomery), bursts into a saloon and shoots dead the legendary Wild Bill Hickok (Douglas Kennedy). Arrested and put on trial, McCall recounts a twisted tale that paints Hickok as anything but heroic, explaining how Hickok and McCall's cousin Bat (James Seay) took over McCall's family's plantation, killed his parents and even framed him for crimes he didn't commit. McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: An Arizona land-grabber (Telly Savalas) and his brother (George Maharis) renew their feud amid Army troops and Apaches.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: J.W. Coop
programme.desc: After spending a decade behind bars for writing bad checks and punching a cop, former rodeo star J.W. Coop (Cliff Robertson) re-enters a world drastically different from how he left it; the only constant seems to be his mother (Geraldine Page). Gradually coming to terms with societal changes and cultural norms, Coop is determined to climb back to the top spot on the rodeo circuit. Along the way, he hooks up with Bean (Cristina Ferrare), a liberated woman who helps him catch up to modern life.

programme.title: Coroner Creek
programme.desc: A gunfighter (Randolph Scott) loses his beloved in a robbery and hunts the man (George Macready) to blame, who is living off the loot.

programme.title: The Desperadoes
programme.desc: Sheriff Steve Upton (Randolph Scott) is a devoted lawman who works tirelessly to keep order in his small town, nestled within the Utah territory. So, when Cheyenne Rogers (Glenn Ford), an old friend with a criminal past, rolls into town, Upton is immediately on edge. Cheyenne assures his pal that all that's behind him now. But when the town bank is robbed, Cheyenne becomes the locals' number one suspect. He'll have to prove his innocence to save himself and his friend's reputation.

programme.title: Oklahoma Crude
programme.desc: An oil derrick owner in early 1900s Oklahoma, along with her father and a bum, tries her best to keep oil companies from buying her estate.

programme.title: Legend of the Golden Gun
programme.desc: After his family is killed, a quiet, young farmer turns into a deadly gunfighter, dedicating his life to the pursuit of evildoers.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wounded rancher (Randolph Scott) hides with a schoolmarm (Ellen Drew) after his ex-girlfriend's husband (Alexander Knox) runs him out of town.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: They Came to Cordura
programme.desc: On a mission to Mexico, U.S. Maj. Tom Thorn (Gary Cooper) is branded a coward, while several of his fellow servicemen are praised for showing bravery. Tom is asked to transport the heroes through harsh terrain so they can be honored. Also along for the journey is Adelaide Geary (Rita Hayworth), a woman charged with conspiring against the United States. But, as his fellow soldiers begin revealing their treacherous sides, Tom realizes that Adelaide is the only heroic one of the bunch.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: Cowboy

programme.title: The Quick Gun
programme.desc: A banished gunfighter (Audie Murphy) returns to his sweetheart (Merry Anders) and helps his sheriff friend (James Best) face outlaws.

programme.title: The Untamed Breed
programme.desc: Texas ranchers resist an out-of-towner (Sonny Tufts) who has a Brahman bull to breed.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: The Stranger Wore a Gun

programme.title: Riders of the Northwest Mounted

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: Former Union soldier John Parrish (Glenn Ford) wants to sell his ranch and start a new life by settling down out east. However, the ruthless tactics of Lew Wilkison (Edward G. Robinson), the scheming businessman interested in his property, make Parrish reconsider the move, especially after one of his ranch hands is murdered. Adding to the increasingly tense conflict is Wilkison's wife, Martha (Barbara Stanwyck), who is cheating on her husband with his brother, Cole (Brian Keith).

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
programme.desc: Texan and U.S. Cavalryman Lt. Frank Hewitt (Audie Murphy) deserts the army after Colorado Union soldiers carry out the deadly Sand Creek reservation massacre, fearing reprisal from the Cheyenne. Crossing into Texas, Franks finds himself labeled a traitor for fighting with the Yankees, and his warnings about possible Indian revenge go unheeded. When a town near a mission, populated mostly by women, is attacked, Frank is appointed their protector and must build an army comprised of townswomen.

programme.desc: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and several other residents of a small Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Peter and Caroline Cave are house-hunting in Midsomer Newton. Shortly before leaving their hotel they mention they haven't been able to find what they're looking for; "something old and derelict that they can do up." Anne Merrick tells them about Winyard, a tumbledown cottage in the woods, might be for sale. At the estate agents they are told the house is not yet available for viewing. Later that evening they find the house on their own. However, Caroline has read up on the cottage's haunted reputation and only reluctantly explores it with Peter. The next morning they are found strangled in their own car. DCI Barnaby starts the investigation with the help of PC Ben Jones and they come across the world of estate agents, identical twins, ghosts, piano wire, and more before another body turns up.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.desc: When a barrister is killed in Midsomer, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. Grady has just returned to the village where he committed the murder years ago amid much anger from locals. But Grady has a solid alibi. Barnaby suspects he is working with an accomplice - until Grady himself is targeted in an arson attack.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of a journalist has chilling echoes of a 1960s horror film starring Midsomer's own Stella Harris. When Stella's more famous sister returns after a 40-year family rift, the killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot. Is life - and death - imitating art?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, amateur astronomer Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite. Barnaby and Jones soon discover intrigue, sexual tension and academic rivalry are rife among the star-seeking community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harriet Farmer wakes up after being in a coma since the night she tried to elope. Soon afterwards, a killer strikes members of a chess club. Could the attack which left Harriet for dead a year ago be linked to moves on a chess board? And where is her boyfriend Finn?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A woman is crushed to death with a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue. Secret and controversial plans to modernise the dairy are revealed while rumours about private lives of the parents cause a row at the prestigious local prep school. As other people linked to the dairy meet agonising deaths, long-held secrets start to emerge...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Milton Cross, a feudal estate with a church, farms, houses and acres of land, depend on lord of the manor Edward Milton for their livelihoods. But when Sonia Woodley is stabbed in the churchyard two years after the death of her abusive husband Gerald, Barnaby and Jones investigate, trying to work out who killed her. It soon becomes clear someone took a pair of tailor scissors to do the deed, but who amongst the villagers could have done so, is unclear, and the investigation is complicated, when the pair learn the local Anglican priest, the parish vicar, had received a letter from Sonia. When he himself is killed, the pair believe something in the letter may be key to solving the mystery.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby is not convinced about Mayor David Hicks' plans to revive an annual trip to Brighton, suspecting his proposal to buy coastal land there, is rather a fraudulent scheme. Naturally, he joins the trip, but during their time in Brighton, a hated property developer (Tim McInnerny) is beheaded on a ghost house ride, prompting Barnaby to team up with his cousin to determine whether the developer's renters, the mayor, a gloomy reverend (Mark Gatiss), or the lady of a large estate are responsible, and soon discovers a hotbed of jealously, debt, lies and more, conceal a far darker secret.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Ford Florey is a town with a Wild West Society and many grudges. During a Wild West show at the local faire, the witch on the 'Dunk the Witch' stall is well and truly dunked but laughter soon turns to horror when she doesn't get up and the water in the tank starts to turn red. Barnaby and Jones need to be quick on the draw to track down the murderer, and soon begin to wonder whether a dispute over land was the motive, or something far more sinister, especially when more people are killed, with methods linked to the Wild West.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: On a dark night in the village of March Magna, Barnaby's wife Joyce swerves her car and narrowly misses a shadowy figure in the road - or so she thinks, when later that night a body is discovered in the old cemetery. The victim was a member of the council who was strange and weird, but someone seemed to have quite a grudge on him, and so Barnaby and Jones delve into his background, and the village, attempting to determine who might have wanted him dead, finding ghosts, grudges, and more beneath the village's surface.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Piano student Zoe Stock has won a place at the Devington Manor Winter School led by internationally renowned musician, Sir Michael Fielding (James Fox). Yet when she is there, things become mysterious when from the river bank in the grounds of the manor she sees a woman jump from the bridge and disappear underwater. When Barnaby and Jones start investigating the possible drowning, they discover unsavoury connections to the past that could prove lethal 20 years later, especially when someone attempts to kill. It isn't long, before murder does occur, and the detectives attempt to fathom what occurred in the drowning, and the present day murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Midsomer Morchard's very own boxer, John Kinsella, wins a world title in New York, the success seems to be a joyous time for all, until murder rears its ugly head. When a local solicitor is found dead by his assistant and Kinsella's manager, Barnaby attempts to determine what is going on, and soon discover issues with inheritance, affairs, anger, and gambling to make matters difficult. Meanwhile Kinsella's trainer Teddy Molloy (Phil Daniels) has his own hidden agenda. When a re-enactment of a Victorian boxing match gets heated, and Kinsella's manager is found dead in his home's gym, the pair attempt to determine who is responsible, although Barnaby's judgement seems to be clouded on this one.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A planning dispute turns to murder, after a leading light in the Midsomer Conservation Society suspects her neighbours are involved in a money-making development scam. Political wrangling, burglaries and sexual liaisons abound in picturesque Great Pelfe - but when a member of the possible scam is themselves murdered, Barnaby wonders what is truly going on behind the scenes of an important by-election.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby reluctantly accompanies Joyce on a spa weekend to Swavely Manor. But as he attempts to de-stress, a woman is found dead in the flotation chamber. He abandons his treatment to investigate, but his personal worries are never far away as he contemplates his future, while trying to determine if an argument between the spa's owners and their neighbours is the motive, or something else.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The closing of what was once a very popular public garden in Midsomer Deverell sparks a series of murders that have Inspector Barnaby and Sgt. Troy stumped.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Following the funeral of local hotelier Karl Wainwright, his hotel's manager and a well liked Punch and Judy performer, Gregory Chambers, disappears unusually in yet another picturesque Midsomer village. Most people dismiss his disappearance completely but when he doesn't turn up, a search is conducted and a severed hand, confirmed to be Gregory's, turns up in the woods. Further deaths and a mushroom poisoning occur surrounding the beneficiaries of Karl Wainwright's will. All is not as it seems.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A man's naked body found under mysterious circumstances, within a crop circle on Sir Harry Chatwyn's wheat field, leads police to investigating how he wound up in the field after being electrocuted. While the nearby village of Midsomer Parva is abuzz with UFO mania, Barnaby is unconvinced by a local ufologist that the man's death was the result of alien activity, as he uncovers rivalries, theft and hatred during his investigations, soon after a well known burglar is found dead in another crop circle with identical injuries.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Returning home one night, in a drunken state, the local doctor of Newton Magna calls in the police after he had accidentally hit a man, yet when Barnaby and Troy arrive, the injured man is nowhere to be found. As they investigate the mystery, Barnaby encounters an old adversary who is working to help renovate the village and whose daughter is getting married to a local boy. Matters soon become complicated, when the body of the best man's father is found in a well that was being renovated, whom the detectives soon discover had disappeared on the day he was planning to run away with a local farmer's wife.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Dave Cutler, Goodman's Land's amorous postman, is found almost decapitated near the common early one morning. Newspaper girl Holly Reid (Kate Maberly) tells Barnaby that she heard music playing faintly nearby. Barnaby and Troy are aided in their investigations by local WPC Jay Nash (Gillian Kearney).

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and new detective Charlie Nelson moves into Midsomer. He's thrown straight into an intriguing mystery in the village of Morton Shallows. A man is fatally stabbed with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a "haunted" manor house. Can Barnaby and Nelson find a more earthly motive behind the murder and trap the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of murders in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day "sinners". But who is responsible and why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to restaurant Wyvern House and its tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron. Secrets from the past surface and the killer strikes again - but the poison spreads wider than its intended target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in a reservoir dropped out of a plane, Barnaby and Nelson find the world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets. Are campaigners against the local airfield behind Bernard King's murder or does it link back to a tragic story from World War Two?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. They discover Eric Calder had more linking him to Copenhagen than just his famous Golden Clusters.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Troy tackle two separate cases as Troy prepares to leave Midsomer after his promotion to DI.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby's new Sergeant arrives on the day after the murder of a local shrew occurs, and he is immediately put to work.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: It's between Shelby and Ford to see who will cross the million-dollar mark first as the World's Greatest Collector Car Auctions continues in Scottsdale, Arizona!

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Another million-dollar vehicle is sold when some of the greatest customs, classics, trucks and supercars cross the auction block at no reserve in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Chevys and Fords strive to break past six figures on the auction block as various vehicles sell for no reserve at the World's Greatest Collector Car Auctions in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Fords, Chevys, Land Rovers, and more take center stage as vehicles of all sizes and shapes shine for the buyers bidding big bucks in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Big bucks for Broncos and Mustangs as cowboys and cowgirls go head-to-head wrangling some of the best deals at the World's Greatest Collector Car Auctions in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: It's Ford versus Ferrari and Corvettes versus Chevelles as the World's Greatest Collector Car Auctions continue to break records selling incredible vehicles in beautiful Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The bidding is fast and furious as celebrity vehicles cross the auction block; JFK, Rod Stewart, and Gen. Colin Powell are just some of the owners of cars selling at no reserve.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: It's Lamborghini versus everyone in Scottsdale, Ariz.; The World's Greatest Collector Car Auctions once again feature some of the most scintillating vehicles ever sold, including a Lamborghini Diablo owned by Danny Koker.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Fords, Pontiacs, Chevys, and Porsches go head to head as bidders go dollar for dollar trying to get the best deals on the finest vehicles in sunny Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Roadsters, Superbirds, and Porsche 911s are the main attraction, but a Fast Attack Buggy from "Fast & Furious 7," a replica John Deere Tractor, a Little Gem Travel Trailer, and a Divco Custom Milk Truck are also sure to turn heads.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Among a bevy of beautiful vehicles being auctioned at no reserve are Simon Cowell's 1970 Triumph Spitfire MK III Convertible and John Mayer's 2006 Ford GT Heritage Edition!

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny and Kevin visit mad mechanic Gordon to see his latest insane creation. Meanwhile, Danny shakes the rust off a '34 Ford.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Like in the cartoons, the Plymouth Road Runner has always eluded Danny.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: The shop has its hands full restoring a 1942 Ford truck that needed a lot of TLC and a special touch for the owner's wife. Danny and Ryan check out a badass 1929 Ford Roadster.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny has a customer who wants to restore a 1942 Ford truck that saw some action in WWII. But when Danny takes in the project he quickly learns it'll need a lot more.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: A customer wants to trick out his 2004 Harley Davidson Road Glide, but both Shannon and Ryan aren't sure they can do everything he wants.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Kevin and the team come together to make something special for Danny. Meanwhile Danny runs into an old pal and his 1959 Corvette gasser.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Kevin is won over by a hotrod pick-up truck, Danny tracks down a customer's original 1969 Firebird but its terrible condition may make it impossible to restore.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny acquires a '62 Caddy which he hopes will be a huge flip. Ryan devises a secret plan for the car behind Danny's back, but when Danny finds out there's some explaining to do.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny tries to get the derailed '62 Caddy project back on track, while Ryan tries to make amends for a mishap by finding a flip or two for the shop.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny checks out a mind-blowing collection, which includes a 1933 Ford Roadster and a '53 Henry J. Meanwhile Kevin, Ryan and Mike make.

programme.desc: Ryan works on a secret project for chopper shop Bones Legacy, while a Chevy Impala that redefines "lowrider" blinds Mike and Roli.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: A chainsaw accident leaves the crew short-handed; Jason flips a loaded trailer; Shelby finds out if he filled his board foot order.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Rygaard crew gets a surprise visit from logging legend Craig Rygaard; the Zitterkopfs face a major obstacle in their push to complete their largest ever job; Papac battles the Longest Yard unit with its mile long skyline.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Washington, three generations of Rygaard loggers are fighting for the crown; Papack Alaska Logging moves into their final section; Gary and Eddie see if their swamp logging gamble has paid off.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: A breakdown forces Jason Rygaard to choose between his crew's safety and finishing the job; Frank Harkness is caught in a whiteout while moving the excavator on a narrow mountainside logging road.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Joe Linderborg is back in the yarder seat and the whole crew is paying the price; DJ comes face-to-face with Craig after two years; Shelby and niece Stephanie stumble into a wasp's nest; S&S realizes they aren't alone on the Withlacoochee River.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe gets some help from an unlikely family member; Shelby's log buyer stops by for a surprise visit; Kraken and Katelyn find that logging without Capt. Clint might not be as easy as they thought.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby's wild ride could end his season early; Rygaard and Oakes compete in a no-holds barred turf war; an accident sidelines one of the Papac crew; Logzilla continues to derail Kraken.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Washington, the crew nearly topples the yarder; a drastic toothache remedy; Chapman races a storm in Florida.

programme.desc: Shelby's client needs good quality logs to build high-end furniture that will raise money for a local charity; to find the right logs they must go deeper and deeper into the gator-infested wilderness.

programme.desc: Rygaard Logging is trying to get back on track with the help of patriarch Craig Rygaard; the Swampman's under the gun to build an emergency treetop storm shelter; David Zitterkopf's son Levi gets a crucial lesson in logging.

programme.desc: Papac Logging is barely holding onto their lead; the Rygaards will have to work as a team if they're gonna reclaim the title; Shelby Stanga's under the gun, but has a secret map to a possible stash of sunken logs.

programme.desc: Belinda brings in a new assistant; Jason disagrees with Gabe's management style; Mike Papac bring in a long time friend of the family to help in the rigging.

programme.desc: Shelby goes on the hunt for the thief who stole his boat; Rygaard refuses to allow Oakes to pass through their landing; Clint's boat nearly goes up in smoke; Swilley pulls up a prize from the bottom of the lake.

programme.desc: After coming across a rare historical artifact, Shelby forms an unlikely alliance with Professor Sam Hyde of Southeastern Louisiana University and the two scour the deepest parts of the Swamp on the search for lost treasures.

programme.desc: Gabe Rygaard pushes his crew to a breaking point; Gary and Eddie blow up their business to cash in on green gold; David Zitterkopf could see his family empire fall to pieces, with one wrong move; a mutiny is underway among the Chapman crew.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before... including Willie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous "Black Panther,"

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city."

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party for the sale of their 5 millionth duck call, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver. But too much enthusiasm about the celebrity's mode of transportation turns into a drag race showdown between Willie and Clint. Phil and Si have their hands full fixing Ms. Kay's barbecue when a trip to the outdoor grill store turns disastrous.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's Willie's turn to play Santa Claus at the local church this year but Uncle Si crashes the party and the event goes south in a hurry. Meanwhile, the family gathers at Phil and Miss Kay's house to celebrate the holidays in true redneck fashion.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring and is forced to come up with a game plan of how to approach and appease Missy.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie calls the team into work on a Saturday afternoon for an HR training session, but the seminar quickly dissolves from unproductive to complete disaster.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dying his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis. Jase's help turns into a competition amongst the Robertson brothers to see who is most fit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane" to different places.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a planned date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out.

programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends.

programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from--Godwin's House.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse."

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interview her cousin, JD. Willie is hesitant at first, but immediately hits it off with JD, who truly appreciates Willie's sense of humor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old GI Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier.

programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working.

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: The arrival of a new dance mom and her daughter create a huge stir amongst the girls and the dance moms.

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: With Nationals next week, Abby must decide who will be dancing. To help make her decision, Abby assigns each girl, except Maddie, a solo.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: With temperatures rising and the winter roads quickly melting away, it's a mad dash to the finish line.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The end of the line is here. The Polar drivers face the long, difficult journey back down the world's longest seasonal winter road.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: This season, the balance of power on the winter roads is turned upside down. Reigning champ Polar Industries returns, looking to maintain their dominance by any means necessary.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The war for ice road supremacy is heating up and Polar Industries is pushing their drivers to the absolute limit.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar Industries goes for the record books, sending driver Todd on a risky run to deliver the heaviest haul in company history.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar boss Mark Kohaykewych shakes things up when he brings new soldier Mike Simmons into the winter roads battle.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: New business owners Darrell and Lisa get the jolt they need with a high-stakes mission-transformers desperately needed for a distant town's electrical supply.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Darrell Ward and Lisa Kelly try to make good on a power play for their young company but could lose everything when Darrell's truck breaks down.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The battle gets down and dirty as the roads melt beneath the drivers' wheels.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: In the midst of the early thaw, Darrell and Lisa struggle to make it home over the hardest hit trail on the winter roads system.

programme.desc: With only two weeks left of the winter season, the race is on to deliver the remaining loads before the ice roads melt away.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show. The first case involves Frankie, who's had a problem with methamphetamines.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team begin their day by judging the local elementary school's talent show, where they declare all the kids to be winners.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver, Colorado. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take time from their busy schedule to thank their fans by inviting them into their home to celebrate the holiday season. But when Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again the plan changes.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today the team isn't pulling any punches, literally or figuratively! In between tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland is struggling to find time to train.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.
