programme.desc: This roundtable discussion examines the aging of the American workforce, barriers to employment or career advancement for older workers/job seekers, and, importantly, potential solutions to these barriers.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Printmaking is showcased in Greenville as three young artists vie to take the creative crown. Artistry is put to the test as these makers carve, color and print over two days and four hours to create art-worthy new heights.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: Mardi Gras beading in New Orleans and a paper-folding artist in Austin.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Single Samuel is a man on the move looking to find the right woman to settle down with and start a family in Sacramento. He’s in for a treat with a trip to a goat farm, a loop around a rollerskating rink and a very revealing art experience.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Acts of kindess don't always have to be big gestures! Sometimes a favor to a stranger, or a day spent with a friend can make all the difference, as Justin and Ryan learn on the road in Kansas.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Heart, soul and sauce overfloweth when Chef Linda Green (a.k.a. “The Yakamein Lady”) goes up against Chef Estrada from the House of Blues. When you’ve got two chefs who pack a plate with this much love, there are no losers.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: Bourbon Blaze: The Night That Tested America's Spirit
programme.desc: When a massive fire hits one of the nation’s largest bourbon distilleries, the families of competing bourbon companies have to decide whether to lend a hand… or let it burn. This is the story of bourbon, America’s native spirit.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Heists that are so bold, brazen and audacious you have to see them to believe them. But in the world of crime, audacity doesn’t always pay.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: In this battle of the grill, Chef Todd Cassell and Chef Alekka Sweeney face-off to see who can bring home the bragging rights with their Pittsburgh inspired dishes.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Entre, a single dad and musician, searches for his perfect partner in Des Moines. Three bachelorettes compete for a coveted second date. From spirited bar games and paddling on the lake to sweet bakery moments, who will take the cake?

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: Four chefs with roots across the globe share mouth-watering specialties you won’t find anywhere else. From Wakanda braised beef to lamb Kibbeh and Chicken Tikka Masala, find some of Pittsburgh’s best international eats!

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: The charming town of Florence, South Carolina is booming. Explore the revitalized downtown, try your best to solve an escape room, and grab a bite at a local food truck. You can also stay the night on a farm and wake up to your own private petting zoo!

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: From unexpected celebrations to life-changing gifts, this episode showcases incredible surprises that will warm your heart.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Aaron Poret of Bywater American Bistro goes head to head with Chef Jas Rogers, Owner and Creator of Saucex Dat. Will fried dough foil Chef Poret’s chances of success, or will he rise to Chef Rogers’ challenge?

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Two couples browse farmers markets, rock out, and volunteer their time with the birds and the bea-gles on cheap dates in Orlando.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: In today's Food Fight feast, Chefs Zack Shell and Angel Magwood are heading back to school to put their spin on elevated school lunch dishes.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: From a coffeeshop chain to snowy railroad tracks, these unconventional crime scenes bring the childhood game of Cops & Robbers to life.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A man vanishes from a boarding house in 1988. The fight to find him uncovers one of the most shocking cases in Sacramento history and the surprising revelation of a grandmotherly-looking serial killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: David suffered from a blood disorder and hasn’t had a full set of teeth since he was 12. Heather struggles with a rare genetic condition that put her in dentures in her 20s. Can the FIXT team write the final chapter in their health journeys?

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: The Journey: 70 Years of WXII
programme.desc: Celebrating 70 years of WXII 12’s service to the community.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.desc: A man vanishes from a boarding house in 1988. The fight to find him uncovers one of the most shocking cases in Sacramento history and the surprising revelation of a grandmotherly-looking serial killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: David suffered from a blood disorder and hasn’t had a full set of teeth since he was 12. Heather struggles with a rare genetic condition that put her in dentures in her 20s. Can the FIXT team write the final chapter in their health journeys?

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Only In
programme.desc: Every city has its own local flavor, culture and vibe. Only In celebrates communities across America and the people, activities and history that make each place unique.
